tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MicrobiomeData (
    sample_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    bacteria_name VARCHAR(255),
    bacteria_count INT,
    collection_date DATE,
    patient_id UUID
)

CREATE TABLE microbiome_data (id INT PRIMARY KEY, sample_id INT, bacteria_name VARCHAR(100), abundance FLOAT); CREATE TABLE gut_health_data (id INT PRIMARY KEY, sample_id INT, patient_id INT, health_status VARCHAR(50));

CREATE TABLE analysis_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_id INT REFERENCES microbiome_samples(sample_id),
    subject_id INT REFERENCES research_subjects(subject_id),
    analysis_date DATE,
    analysis_type VARCHAR(100),
    result_value DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE microbiome_samples (
    sample_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT NOT NULL,
    sample_date DATE,
    microbial_species TEXT,
    abundance FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE patient_data (
    patient_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name TEXT,
    age INT,
    gender TEXT,
    ethnicity TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE microbial_species_info (
    species_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    species_name TEXT,
    habitat TEXT,
    phylum TEXT,
    class TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE sample_analysis (
    analysis_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_id INT,
    analysis_date DATE,
    analysis_type TEXT,
    result VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE samples (
  sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_name STRING,
  collection_date DATE,
  bacteria_count INT,
  patient_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE studies (
  study_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  study_name STRING,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  researcher_id INT
);
